biotools.summary: Allows for visualization of genomic data. Developed for visualizing high throughput (next generation) sequencing data, it can also be used to visualize virtually any genome-based sequence, point, interval, or continuous dataset.

bioschemas.name: Savant Genome Browser
bioschemas.summary: Allows for visualization of genomic data. Developed for visualizing high throughput (next generation) sequencing data, it can also be used to visualize virtually any genome-based sequence, point, interval, or continuous dataset.
